name: Astral Protection
description: Reincarnation's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>3.0</dynamic> min, and reincarnating instantly grants you Astral Shift.

name: Refreshing Waters
description: Your Healing Surge is <dynamic>15%</dynamic> more effective on yourself.

name: Vital Accretion
description: Your Earth Elemental increases your maximum health by <dynamic>20%</dynamic>.

name: Thunderous Paws
description: Ghost Wolf increases your movement speed by an additional <dynamic>10%</dynamic> for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 60 sec.

name: Totemic Surge
description: The cooldowns of Tremor Totem, Earthbind Totem, and Capacitor Totem are reduced by <dynamic>1 sec</dynamic>.

name: Spiritual Resonance
description:
<condition>Heroism</condition>
<dynamic>Heroism</dynamic>

Bloodlust or any similar effects also grant you <dynamic>4.0 sec</dynamic> of 

<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Spirit Walk</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec><spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Spiritwalker's Grace</dynamic>

name: Crippling Hex
description: Enemies affected by your Hex deal <dynamic>8%</dynamic> reduced damage for 8 sec after Hex is removed.

name: High Voltage
description: Lightning Bolt has a <dynamic>30%</dynamic> chance to generate an extra stack of Fulmination.

name: Shake the Foundations
description: Casting Earthquake has a <dynamic>15%</dynamic> chance to instantly cast Chain Lightning at a random enemy in the Earthquake.

name: Call of Flame
description:
<condition>Storm Elemental</condition>
<dynamic>Storm Elemental</dynamic>

Fire Elemental lasts <dynamic>15%</dynamic> longer.

name: Earth and Sky
description: Earth Shock and Elemental Blast's damage are increased by <dynamic>7.0%</dynamic> for each stack of Fulmination they discharge.

name: Unruly Winds
description: Windfury Weapon has a <dynamic>40%</dynamic> chance to trigger a third attack.

name: Focused Lightning
description: Maelstrom Weapon increases the damage or healing of your next spell by an additional <dynamic>4.0%</dynamic> per stack.

name: Chilled to the Core
description: Frost Shock has a <dynamic>20%</dynamic> chance to grant 2 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

name: Embrace of Earth
description: Earth Shield increases your healing done to the target by an additional <dynamic>5.0%</dynamic>.

name: Magma Fist
description: Lava Lash has an additional <dynamic>25%</dynamic> critical strike chance against enemies affected by your Flame Shock.

name: Swirling Currents
description: Using Healing Stream Totem increases the healing of your next 3 Healing Surge, Healing Wave, or Riptide spells by <dynamic>20%</dynamic>.

name: Heavy Rainfall
description: Using Healing Tide Totem increases the healing of your Healing Rain by <dynamic>150%</dynamic> for 20 sec.

name: Nature's Reach
description: Chain Heal has a <dynamic>40%</dynamic> chance to jump to an additional ally.

name: Elysian Dirge
description: Vesper Totem is <dynamic>100%</dynamic> more effective against the target nearest to it.

name: Essential Extraction
description: Fae Transfusion deals <dynamic>10%</dynamic> increased damage, and channels <dynamic>10%</dynamic> faster.

name: Lavish Harvest
description: The critical strike chance of Chain Harvest is increased by <dynamic>10.0%</dynamic>.

name: Tumbling Waves
description: Primordial Wave has a <dynamic>20%</dynamic> chance to not incur its cooldown.
